summary.para: The CapturedMetadataISOGains structure describes the blob format for MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_ISO_GAINS.

remarks.para: The CapturedMetadataISOGains structure only describes the blob format for the MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_ISO_GAINS attribute. The metadata item structure for ISO gains (KSCAMERA_METADATA_ITEMHEADER + ISO gains metadata payload) is up to driver and must be 8-byte aligned.
